snippet: Nearly 100 explosions are scheduled to be set off deep beneath parts of Southern California this fall, part of an experiment that could help uncover unknown earthquake faults and areas vulnerable to violent shaking....
lead_paragraph: Nearly 100 explosions are scheduled to be set off deep beneath parts of Southern California this fall, part of an experiment that could help uncover unknown earthquake faults and areas vulnerable to violent shaking.
abstract: Nearly 100 explosions are scheduled to be set off deep beneath parts of Southern California this fall, part of experiment that could help uncover unknown earthquake faults and areas vulnerable to violent shaking (S)

headline.main: U.S. Plans 100 Blasts to Detect California Faults
